org.apache.taverna.wsdl.parser

Class WSDLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.wsdl.parser.WSDLParser

  • public class WSDLParser
extends Object
    A Parser for processing WSDL files to determine information about available services and the required types needed to invoke that particular service. Handles Complex Types and wsdl imports.
    Author:
    Stuart Owen, Stian Soiland-Reyes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WSDLParser(String wsdlLocation)
      Constructor which takes the location of the base wsdl file, and begins to process it

        public boolean isWsrfService()
        Checks whether ANY of defined ports is an WSRF one.
        Returns:
        true if there is at least one WSRF port found.

      • getStyle

        @Deprecated
public String getStyle()
                            throws UnknownOperationException
        Deprecated. 
        N.B. a style is defined on per operation basis, so there can be different types within a same document. This method is to be removed in the next versions of parser.
        Returns:
        the style, i.e. document or rpc
        Throws:
        UnknownOperationException

      • getOperationNamespaceURI

        public String getOperationNamespaceURI(String operationName)
                                throws UnknownOperationException
        returns the namespace uri for the given operation name, throws UnknownOperationException if the operationName is not matched to one described by the WSDL.

        Note that if you need the namespace for constructing the fully qualified element name of the operation, you might want to use getOperationQname(String) instead.

        Parameters:
        operationName -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnknownOperationException
        See Also:
        getOperationQname(String)

        UnknownOperationException
